details:
The fix for [CVE-2018-10886](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2018-10886) was incomplete in the previous upload. New
changes was implemented upstream which check and resolve symlinks
before expanding the archives.


For Debian 8 Jessie, this problem has been fixed in version
1.9.4-3+deb8u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your ant packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
